CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(JV__c),NOT( Deal_ID__c ="12")), TEXT(YEAR(Date__c+5))+'%2f'+IF( LEN(TEXT(Month(Date__c+5))) > 1 , TEXT(Month(Date__c+5)), "0" + TEXT(Month(Date__c+5))) + "%2f" + IF(LEN(TEXT(Day(Date__c+5))) > 1 , TEXT(Day(Date__c+5)), "0" + TEXT(Day(Date__c+5))),"")
CustomField.label: RevShareWindow
